pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kafka Tools===========This repository is a collection of tools for working with`Apache Kafka <http://kafka.apache.org>`_.The Site Reliability team for Kafka at LinkedIn has built these over time inorder to make managing Kafka a little bit easier. Our intention is to add tothis repository as more tools are developed.We welcome additions and modifications that make managing Kafka better for all!.. image::
